name: WarrantyPromise
description: A structured value representing the duration and scope of services that will be provided to a customer free of charge in case of a defect or malfunction of a product.
title: WarrantyPromise

fields.name: durationOfWarranty
fields.title: durationOfWarranty
fields.description: The duration of the warranty promise. Common unitCode values are ANN for year, MON for months, or DAY for days.

fields.name: warrantyScope
fields.title: warrantyScope
fields.description: The scope of the warranty promise.
